name: Priyansh Narang
projectDescription: KiddieGPT is an AI-powered web application that generates personalized stories for children. The platform allows kids to choose story themes, customize characters, and enjoy engaging bedtime tales designed to spark imagination and learning. Built with modern web technologies, it provides a safe and interactive environment for children to explore creative storytelling.

name: Muneer Ali
projectDescription: DocMagic is an open-source, AI-driven platform that empowers users to generate professional documents through simple prompts. The platform supports resumes, CVs, cover letters, SOPs, and more using advanced AI models. It delivers instant, personalized, and ATS-optimized content with seamless export options to LaTeX, PDF, and PowerPoint formats.
techStack: Nextjs,typescript,tailwindcss,supabase etc
tags: opensource, firstcontribution, goodfirstissue, ai, resume-builder, document-generator, latex, gemini-api, reactjs, expressjs, supabase, tailwindcss, pptxgenjs, career-tools, ats-resume, developer-tools, hacktoberfest, gsoc, education-tech, docmagic

name: Muneer Ali
projectDescription: Thunder is an open-source, full-stack website builder that enables developers, startups, and entrepreneurs to create dynamic, production-ready websites in minutes. name: Tushar Chaurasia
